resources.string: Group must have a minimum of 7 members and a maximum of 30 members.
Group must have a minimum of 7 members and a maximum of 16 members.
Group must have a minimum of 7 members and a maximum of 12 members.
Interest rate is -6%, -5%, -3%, -2% for the first four and 2%, 4% 5% for the last three.
